= Introduction =

MediaFormatBridge is the object representing media format(codec).


== `:new(...)` ==
_ctor_
creates CnxInfoBridge object

|| *named parameter* || *description* ||
|| mf|| other MediaFormatBridge ||
|| id || id of well known supprted codec  (PCMU,PCMA,SPEEX)||
|| name|| name of the codec||
|| rate|| sampling rate of the codec||
|| type || type of media format (MediaType_SPEECH,MediaType_DTMF) ||

{{{

--
-- creates invalid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx1 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new())

--
-- creates valid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx2 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new{ip="192.168.100.5", port=6000})


--
-- creates valid CnxInfoBridge
--
cnx3 = assert(CnxInfoBridge:new{cnx=cnx1})

}}}

== `:ip()` ==
_property_

ip address

== `:port()` ==
_property_

port

== `:address()` ==
_property_

address in "ip:port" form
